item.title: Vipul is
item.description:
• He/His/Him
  • CI/Infrastructure team @ Fedora | CentOS - Community Platform Engineering @ Red Hat
  • CentOS CI babysitter and doer of thing in Fedora land
  • ambassador @ Fedora Project
  • FOSS enthusiast & evangelist
  • Developer and a Command Line Hero
  • Distribution Devroom manager @ FOSDEM
